column7: Formulation and analysis of mathematical models for random phenomena; extensive involvement with the analysis of real data; and instruction in statistical and computing techniques as needed. 3 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. May be repeated in the same or separate terms if topics vary. Prerequisite: STAT 410; STAT 425. Some topics may require additional prerequisites. Read the section text for each topic.
